attributes.action: Give Great Yarmouth the official title of "The Biggest Seaside Town Dump"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great Yarmouth is probably the dirtiest dump of a seaside town, if the PM gave this town the title 'Dump'.  The town leaders may crawl out from their village home and clean the town up.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
